original_text: The women asked each other, ‘Who will roll away the heavy stone for us? It closes the hole in the rock where they put Jesus' dead body.’
korean_text: 서로 말하되 누가 우리를 위하여 무덤 문에서 돌을 굴려 주리요 하더니

sentences.original_text: Who will roll away the heavy stone for us?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 우리를 위해 무거운 돌을 굴려줄까요?

sentences.original_text: It closes the hole in the rock
where they put Jesus' dead body
